ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the other collaborators who took part in the Science Communication Fellowship described above: Dennis Cain (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration), Dr. Cornelia Caragea (University of North Texas), Nick Bontrager (Texas Christian University), and Dr. Magnus Rittby (Texas Christian University). The fellowshipâ€™s educational event was also assisted by numerous student workers: Teneal Metcalf, Katie Hervey, Lauren Nolan, Tasneem Alqahtani, Alshaima Almarwai, Mary Darden, and Emily Marlow. The authors declare that there are no conflicts of interest.
